div.head: kuṟippurai
32 — karaṭu peyarttatu.
karaṭu – yāṉaiyiṉ mataccerukku.
div.p:
[utayaṇaṉ piraccōtaṉaṉuṭaiya viruppattiṉpaṭi avaṉatu
paṭṭattu yāṉaiyiṉ mataccērukkai aṭakkiyūrntatum, appōḻatu
avaṉ aṉpu pārāṭṭiyatum, utayaṇaṉum vācavatattaiyum oruvarai
yoruvar nōkkik kāḻaṟṟatum, piṟavum ippakutiyāl aṟiyalākum.]
1. poruḷpurinūl - artta cāttiram

2. alakai - aḷavu, uraiyāṇi; ulakapurāṇam - ulakattiṉ
paḻaiya varalāṟṟaik kūṟum nūl; ulōka vilācaṉiyeṉavum vaḻaṅ
kappeṟum.

3. pācaṇṭiyarkaḷ - pāṣaṇṭiyarkaḷ; ivarkaḷ toṇṇūṟ
ṟāṟu camaya cāttirat tarukkak kōvaiyaiyuṭaiyarātaliṉ, palavakai
marapiṟ pācaṇṭiyarkaḷ eṉṟār; cilap. 6; 14 - 5-ām aṭi
kaḷukku aṭiyārkkunallāreḻutiya vicēṭavuraiyaiyum avaṟṟiṉ
kīḻkkuṟippaiyum pārkka.

lg.l: niṉvaḻip paṭukeṉa maṉṉava ṉuraiyāk maṉṉavaṟkuraiyā maṉṉavaṟkuraippa

div.p:
3-4. pācaṇṭiyarkaḷ calacalaveṉṟu āravārikkiṉṟa palavakaip
paṭṭa camaya vikaṟpa nūlkaḷeṉka.

2-4. ulōka vilācaṉiyum peruvaḷanallūrp pācaṇṭamum
(yā - vi. oḻipu. kū. 2, urai) eṉa varutalāl, inta iraṇṭu nūlkaḷ
tamiḻmoḻiyiṟ paṇṭaikkālattil iruntaṉaveṉṟu terikiṉṟatu.

7. uppāṟporuḷum - mēṟkūṟiyavaṟṟil aṭaṅkāta nūṟ
poruḷkaḷaiyum; uppāl - appāl; antaṇaṉ paṅkuvi ṉillat
tuṇaikkup pāleyta pari. 11.
8. uḷappāṭuṭaimai - eṇṇamuṭaimai.

9. iḷamaiyoṭu - iḷamaiyil; urupumayakkam; oṭu: eṇ
ṇoṭuvumām.

11. maruṭkai - viyappu; itu piṟaṉkaṭ ṭōṉṟiya perumai
paṟṟiya meyppāṭu. purintaruḷi - virumpi.

12. emmuṭai aḷavaiyil - emmāliyaṉṟa aḷavu. pēṇi - pātu
kāttu.

13. nuṉpatip peyarkkum aḷavaiyiṉ - uṉatu nakarākiya kōcam
pikku uṉṉaiyaṉuppum varaiyil; nuṉ: ticaiccol; cīvaka. 324.
14. maṉṉavaṉ - piraccōtaṉaṉ.

13-4. numpiyar niṉvaḻippaṭuka - uṉ tampiyarākiya ivar uṉakku
aṭaṅki ēval kēṭṭu naṭappārāka; aracaṉ taṉ kumārarai utayaṇaṉ
tampiyarāka upacarittuk kūṟiṉaṉ.

15 kulaṅkeḻu kumararai - taṉ kumārarkaḷai. kuṟṟēlaruḷi - uta
yaṇaṉukkuk kuṟṟēval ceyyumpaṭi kaṭṭaḷaiyiṭṭu; kuṟṟēl: vikā
ram; kuṟṟēl ceytuṅ kāḷaiyum yāṉum (cīvaka. 1057.) pirac
cōtaṉaṉuṭaiya kumārar utayaṇaṉiṭam vilvittai mutaliyavaṟṟaik
kaṟṟaṉareṉṟu teriyavarutalāl, kumarar eṉpataṟku iṅṅaṉam
poruḷ koḷḷalāyiṟṟu.

16 kalantu - aracaṉum utayaṇaṉum maṉaṅkalantu. kaṭṭuraik
kālattu - poruḷ potinta coṟkaḷaic collikkoṇṭu aḷa
vaḷāvum poḻutiṉkaṇ.

17 kaḻi - muḷai; kayiṟeṉpārumuḷar; takka. 182, uraiyaip
pārkka.
18 nukam - nukattaṭi.

17-8 vaṭakaṭaliṭṭa oru nukattiṉ oru tuḷaiyil teṉkaṭa
liṭṭa oru kaḻiceṉṟu kōttāṟ pōla (iṟai. cū. 2, urai);
paravai veṇṭirai vaṭakaṭaṟ paṭunukat tuḷaiyuṭ, ṭiraicey ceṉ
kaṭa liṭṭatōr nōṉkaḻi civaṇi, araica vattuḷai yakavayiṟ ceṟin
teṉa (cīvaka. 2749); vaḷaipayil kīḻkaṭa ṉiṉṟiṭa mēlkaṭal
vāṉukattiṉ, tuḷaivaḻi nērkaḻi kōtteṉa (tirucciṟ. 6); tiṇ
peṟṟa teṉpāl vīraic ceṟinukat tuḷaiyi ṉūṭē, vaṇpeṟṟa vaṭa
pāl vīraik kaḻicela maruvu māpōl meymmoḻi.
19 naṉi cēṇ iṭṭa - mikka tūram iṭaiyiṭṭa.
20 poṟai - poṟuttal. karumam - viṉai; ūḻ.
21 avaṇ - avviṭam; uccayiṉi nakaram. kuṟuki - kuṟuka.
22 vācavatattaikku matiyamum utayaṇaṉukku ñāyiṟum uvamai.
23. niṉṟāṅku - niṉṟāṟpōla.

22-3. veṅkatirk kaṉaliyun taṇkatir matiyamum taṅkati vaḻu
vit talaippeytāṟ pōlavun talaippeytu (iṟai. cū. 2, urai);
katiroruṅ kirunta kāṭci pōla (cilap. 2: 31); añcuṭar
nīḷ vāṇmukat tāyiḻaiyu māṟilā, veñcuṭarnīḷ vēlāṉum
pōtarakkaṇ - ṭañci, yorucuṭaru miṉṟi yulakupā ḻāka, irucuṭarum
pōntaṉaveṉ ṟār tiṇaimālai, eka.

24. tantai talaittāḷ - tantaiyiṉ muṉṉē; tāraṇi vēn
taṉ ṟalaittā ṇikaḻntatu (50) eṉpar piṉṉum; aṉṉavar
talaittā ḷaṇukavu mañci valivala mummaṇik kōvai, 10.
25. pāvai - vācavatattai.
26. kurucil - utayaṇaṉ.

27. parukuvaṉar nikaḻa - oruvaraiyoruvar kaṭaikkaṇṇāl
nōkki nukarāniṟka; iḵtu uḷḷappuṇarcci yeṉappaṭum.
28. yātaṉiṉ - eṉṉa kāraṇattāl. kaḷiṟu - yāṉai.

29. arta yāṉaiyiṉ kolait toḻiṟkuriya kāraṇattai
muṟaiyē kēṭṭa.
31. utayaṇaṉ, viṭaikoṭuttaṟku eṭutta ceṉṉiyaṉāka.

31-2. eṭutta ceṉṉiyaṉ rōkki eṉṟataṉāl, muṉpu
parukuvaṉar (27) eṉṟataṟkuk kaṭaikkaṇṇāl oruvaraiyoruvar
nukarntu iṉpuṟṟaṉareṉṟatu valiyuṟutiṉṟatu.

lg.l: paṇṭu kaṭam paṭāa paṟaiyiṉuṅpaṭā appaṟaiyiṉuṅ kaṉalvaṉa

div.p:
34. kaṭāatta - matattai yuṭaiyaṉa. valimuṟai - valiyilum
piṟappu muṟaiyilum.

35. paṇṭu kaṭam paṭā - muṉpu matam paṭātaṉa; paṟaiyiṉum -
tammait toḻiṟpaṭuttum pēccaip pākaṉ coṉṉālum; ap
pēccukkaḷ, apputu apputu ātu ātu ai ai eṉpaṉa; cīvaka. 1834.
36. cevvi - camayam.

37. tuṭakku - kaṭṭu. tōṭṭi nimirntu - aṅkucam nimira; maṉa
meṉu matta yāṉaiyiṉ, niṟaiyeṉu maṅkuca nimirntu pōyatē kampa.
mitilaik. 40.

38. kaḷiṟeṉpatu iṅkē irupāṟkum potuppeyar; tey
vak kaḷiṟṟaimaṇañ ceytōṉē (kantarkali. 105.) ciṟupāṉmai
peṇ yāṉaikkum matampaṭutal kūṟappaṭum; iḷampiṭi kaṭacceruk
keyti (peruṅ. 1. 40: 31) eṉpar. maṇṭutal - mikkuc cellutal.
35-8. yāṉaikaḷ iraṇṭum iruvarkkum uvamai.
39. il - uyarkuṭi.

40. tol vaḻivayattut toṭarviṉai-ūḻ; itaṉāl ivar paṇ
ṭaip piṟappukkaḷiṟ kaṇavaṉum maṉaiviyumāka iruntamai peṟappaṭum.

42. uḻuvalaṉpiṉ - eḻupiṟappun toṭarntu vanta aṉpiṉai
yuṭaiya; peruṅ. 2. 11: 89. tāṅki - taṭuttu.

43. iḻai - nūliḻai. koṭi - iṅkē nūḻiṟkoṭi; puṇarnta
var muyakkampōṟ purivuṟṟa koṭiyoṭu (kali. 32: 12.) iṭi - mā.
iṭiyiṉuṅ koṭiyiṉu mayaṅki cīvaka. 196.
